data.comment: The match has started, with Nottingham kicking-off.
Stoke take a 1-0 lead thanks to Jordan Thompson.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Stoke.
The second half is underway in Stoke - Stoke with the kick-off.
The home team replace Joe Allen with Sam Clucas.
In the minute 64, Chris Hughton is making the team's first substitution at bet365 Stadium with Joe Lolley replacing Sammy Ameobi.
An unfortunate own goal by James Chester makes the score 1-1.
Stoke make their second substitution with John Mikel Obi replacing Jordan Thompson.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Lewis Grabban with Lyle Taylor. This is the second substitution made today by Chris Hughton.
Jacob Brown (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a third substitution, with Tom Ince replacing Nick Powell.
In the minute 82, It seems as if Jacob Brown is unable to continue. Tashan Oakley-Boothe replaces him for the home team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
